short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension filters images by analyzing their pixels, those within the human skin range are replaced by a grayscale tone

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
*****There are bugs. This extension is under development.*****

This extension attempts to block skin.

This extension works by attempting to filter skin tone colored pixels. 

Please report all bugs. 

feedback@skinfilter.org
